name: ai.com.mcp/skills-search
title: Agent Skills Search Server
description: Search and discover Agent Skills from the skills.sh registry. Powered by HAPI MCP server.

examples.name: Basic Connection
examples.description: Connect to the Agent Skills Search server to discover skills from skills.sh registry.
examples.config: Add 'https://skills-sh.run.mcp.com.ai/mcp' as a remote MCP server in your MCP client.

examples.name: Search for Skills
examples.description: Use the searchSkills tool to find Agent Skills by query string with fuzzy matching.

examples.name: Available Operations
examples.description: The server exposes Agent Skills Search API operations as MCP tools for discovering and browsing skills.
examples.note: Returns skill metadata including install counts, sources, and unique identifiers.

notes: This is the Agent Skills Search MCP server pointing to the skills.sh registry backend.
Public search endpoints are available without authentication.
For self-hosting, run your own HAPI MCP server using:
Docker: docker run -p 3030:3030 -v ~/.hapi:/app/.hapi ghcr.io/apicove/hapi-cli:latest serve skills-search --port 3030 --headless --url https://skills.sh
The HAPI MCP CLI: hapi serve skills-search --port 3030 --headless --url https://skills.sh --openapi https://docs.mcp.com.ai/servers-apis/openapi/skills-search.yaml
Deploy to Cloudflare: hapi deploy --name skills-search --openapi https://docs.mcp.com.ai/servers-apis/openapi/skills-search.yaml --url https://skills.sh
